title: BRIEF-Danakali Says Following Options For Funding To Bring Colluli Into Production
text:
BRIEF-Danakali Says Following Options For Funding To Bring Colluli Into Production

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 18:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Danakali Says Following Options For Funding To Bring Colluli Into Production Oct 30 (Reuters) - Danakali Ltd : * CURRENTLY PURSUING A RANGE OF OPTIONS FOR FUNDING BALANCE OF CAPITAL REQUIRED TO BRING COLLULI INTO PRODUCTION * OPTIONS INCLUDE ADVANCED DISCUSSIONS WITH MULTIPLE POTENTIAL STRATEGIC INVESTORS WHO EXPRESSED INTEREST IN SUPPORTING DEVELOPMENT OF PROJECT * STANDARD CHARTERED IS ACTING AS CORPORATE FINANCIAL ADVISER TO CO, INCLUDING WITH RESPECT TO DISCUSSIONS WITH POTENTIAL STRATEGIC INVESTORS * CASH BALANCE AT 30 SEPT TO BE SUFFICIENT TO TAKE CO THROUGH TO COMPLETION OF COLLULI PROJECT FUNDING, COMMENCEMENT OF PROJECT EXECUTION

BRIEF-Danakali Says Following Options For Funding To Bring Colluli Into Production
description: BRIEF-Danakali Says Following Options For Funding To Bring Colluli Into Production
